attributes.title: terrible ! :(
attributes.review: i downloaded and my phone literally exploded and killed my 2 dogs which sent my grandma into anaphylactic shock ! this app caused me so much trauma and i think i might sue 😭 rip hitler and stalin (not my dogs name just thought i would shout them out) anyways i have to get back to tending to my mother who is in hospice with my aunt. TERRIBLE APP 😒😭😭😤

attributes.title: Anna Bortion.
attributes.review:
Hello💖🙈,I am a 70 yo lady oh and yes men I’m single😛......ANYWAY me being the LoYaL trump supporter I decided to ⒷⓊⓎ ⓉⒽⒾⓈ ⒶⓅⓅ and you’re probably thinking..what’s so bad about that???well my cat fluffy started saying “trump 2020 but in a jail cell” in a 🅳🅴🅼🅾︎🅽🅸🅲 voice🖐👹and I was SCHOCKED😳bc I thought I raised my baby fluff to be a loyal trump supporter😔she proceeds to rip all my trump posters down🖐I now have ptsd🥺

Love, Anna Bortion💖👅💖

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review:
His app was the worst and from my experience I would say to never download this app.(PERIOD) Another thing is too give it a bad review because it's not worth your time to give it a good review and try it out. Never using this again PERIOD!!! 
                           
                                                               GenZ out, PEACE

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Do not download this app, this app contains fake news, it took weeks to download and took up so much storage on my phone. It actually made me delete some of my photos just to install the app. I don’t even have that many photos! Do not and I repeat do not download this app it’s not worth it.

attributes.title: Never again
attributes.review: Upon downloading this app, I felt the sudden urge to beat my wife. I started screaming WHITE POWER and anytime someone corrected me on something the words Trump 2020 came out of my mouth uncontrollably. My wife called the cops on me but they were too busy killing innocent black people and getting away with it.

attributes.title: This App is Terrible
attributes.review: Everything about this app is honestly bad. It take a very long time to download and it very poorly set up. You would think that a billion dollar campaign would make an app worthy of using but everything about this app feels like it’s on a Windows xp laptop

attributes.title: ✨Trash✨ and now I’m blind 😫
attributes.review: I tried to use this app 🤳🏼 however.. the god awful thing actually made my eyes 👀 bleed 🩸 after looking at it for more then 10 milliseconds. Now I’m actually blind. I’m using voice recording to leave a review on this app. Overall 👎🏼👎🏼 two thumbs down, compensation needed...

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is terrible. It took hours to download, and when it finally did download, it glitched my phone so badly I have to get a new one. The app itself interferes with other apps, and wouldn’t stop playing some random music. Do not get this app if you value your phone in any way.

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: I downloaded this to get updates on everything Trump related, I am so sad to say that it did NOT work. When I first got the app I saw there was a trump rally and so I got seats and the I forgot I needed to water my hamster that day! The app then CHARGED me for missing my seats, they charged $10,000 I’m not kidding. Super disappointed 😭

When I downloaded this app I was trying to find out more about are prez Donald Trump. When searching through this app i found out terrible things that I was appalled to hear. If Donald Trump gets elected for president again we mine as well let the coronavirus kill us all. 100% honest rating
